TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ManifestEmbeddedFileProvider extends System.Object implements class Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.IFileProvider

summary.span: 嵌入的文件提供程序，它使用在程序集中编译的清单来重建嵌入文件嵌入程序集中时的原始路径。

span.span: An embedded file provider that uses a manifest compiled in the assembly to reconstruct the original paths of the embedded files when they were embedded into the assembly.
